page.title: 05 WATERMOUTH CASTLE
page.content: Watermouth castle was built in the 1820s and has belonged to the present owner,Mr Haines,since 1977.The castle was in poor condition and Mr Haines improved it and opened it to the public in 1978.He is still making changes today.When we visited,we saw many interesting rooms.There was an old music room,an old Victorian kitchen,an old amusement arcade and dungeons full of fairy tale and smuggling scenes,that came to life when you pressed a button.If you stand in the castle grounds and look across,you can see Watermouth Cove,that once belonged to the castle It was a famous smuggling cove but today it is a harbour for small boats with a yacht club.There is a large caravan site open in the summer months and there are discos for visitors and locals.
